LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Dump.label: Neural Heat Dump
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Dump.description: Transfer neural heat from a target to the mechanoid.
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_MechHackingSlow.label: Neurohacking (Slow)
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_MechHackingSlow.description: Hacks the consciousness of an artificial intelligence and lowers the overall level of consciousness.
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_MechHeal.label: Healing Ray
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_MechHeal.description: Fires a ray of light that promotes cell regeneration.
